id: scenario-value-scanner-single-parent-scenarios-neighborhood-skill sharing network for household tasks maria cannot do alone
title: Skill sharing network for household tasks Maria cannot do alone
description: Skill sharing network for household tasks Maria cannot do alone
content:
Scenario: Skill sharing network for household tasks Maria cannot do alone
    Given some household tasks are difficult or impossible for one person
    And Maria cannot afford to hire professionals for everything
    When Maria needs help with household tasks requiring multiple people or specialized skills
    Then the neighborhood_elohim should coordinate skill sharing network
    And neighbors should exchange help based on different capabilities
    And Maria should access household help through reciprocal labor exchange
    And skill sharing should enable household maintenance without money or partner
    And neighborhood cooperation should solve single-parent capability gaps
